name: Necrocosmos
description:
Move with left click.

Isolated in a dark galaxy you have to find 12 star fragments to bring back the light in the universe. Game is all about the experience of getting lost in the unknown.

Game is a bit long for a jam, I recommand maybe taking 30min-1hour hour to play it because you will probably get lost a lot.
